item.title: Crowder - All My Hope
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music (Non-US)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Dell Vikings - Come Go With Me (Master)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Em, Am, D7, C7, G7
As performed by the Del-Vikings
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/rprSsbEBBzI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Dawn - Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
item.description: Performed by Tony Orlando & Dawn Written by Irwin Levine & L. Russel Brown

item.title: Naomi Scott - Speechless (Full) (From "Aladdin"/Soundtrack Version)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Key of Em.
Chords Used: Em, D7, C, D, G, Bsus4, B, Am, Bm7
Original performance by Naomi Scott, from the (2019) motion picture "Aladdin"
Earlier today, I had posted a version of this without the "follow the chord boxes." I'm not quite sure where they went, as I start with the ukulele version and then move to other versions. So, I have re-uploaded the video. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (GCEA chords & Strumming/Finger Picking): https://youtu.be/aH4_OQ2pNiI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Madness - It Must Be Love
item.description:
Ukulele play along
It Must Be Love - Madness Written by Labi Siffre
Using the chords: Am A7 Bm C D Dm D7 Em E7 G (Some chords have been simplified for teaching purposes) Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Elton John - Crocodile Rock (Remastered)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Crocodile Rock - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: A7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Walk Off The Earth - ME!
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Me! on the ukulele by Walk Off The Earth. The chords used are G C D7 Em.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal - Un Poco Loco (From "Coco"/Soundtrack Version)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Un Poco Loco on the ukulele by Anthony Gonzalez and Gael Garcia Bernal. The chords used are G C D7 A D E7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Doris Day - Whatever Will Be, Will Be
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Que Sera Sera on the ukulele by Doris Day. The chords used are G C D7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
